name: Athletic KB Lunge Variations (@sculptherbody)
description: Four dynamic kettlebell + lunge combos for athletic performance. Lunge clean-to-press, split pass thrust, lunge snatch, and step-back swings. Each combines lower-body with explosive upper-body work.

exercises.notes: Lunge clean-to-press: lunge forward while cleaning, press overhead as you stand. Each side.
Split pass thrust: hold split stance, pass/thrust KB between legs. Focus on stability.
Lunge snatch: reverse lunge + snatch from floor to overhead in one motion. Explosive.
Step-back swing: step back into reverse lunge while swinging KB between legs, drive forward to stand.

tips: These are combination movements — master the individual exercises first
Lunge snatch is the hardest — start light
Great for building athletic power and coordination
Can be added to any leg day as a dynamic finisher
